responses: You can apply online through our admission portal at www.university.edu/apply. The deadline varies by program.

patterns: How much does the course cost?
responses: The fee structure varies by course. Please visit www.university.edu/fees for details. We also offer scholarships and financial aid options.
The exam schedule is available on the student portal under 'Exam Timetable'.
The class schedule is available on the student portal under 'Class Timetable'.
Yes, we offer hostel facilities. You can check availability and apply at www.university.edu/hostel.
The library is open from 8 AM to 8 PM on weekdays. You can borrow books using your student ID. Visit www.university.edu/library for online resources.

patterns: How to get a bus pass?
responses: Yes, we provide transportation services. Bus schedules and pass details are available at www.university.edu/transport.
You can check the latest events and activities on our events page: www.university.edu/events.

patterns: How can I contact my professor?
responses: You can find faculty details and contact information at www.university.edu/faculty.
You can reach us at contact@university.edu or call us at +123-456-7890. Our address is available at www.university.edu/contact.
We offer a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs. Visit www.university.edu/courses for the full list.

patterns: Where can I check my results?
responses: You can check your results on the student portal under 'Exam Results' or visit www.university.edu/results.
Yes, we have internship programs in collaboration with industry partners. Check opportunities at www.university.edu/internships.

patterns: Does the university have placement support?
responses: Our university provides placement support through our career services department. Visit www.university.edu/placements for details.

patterns: How to join a sports team?
responses: Yes, we have various sports facilities and teams. Visit www.university.edu/sports to learn more.
